AND MATCH(i.item_name) AGAINST(#{cond.itemName} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE) > 0
AND MATCH(b.brand_name) AGAINST(#{cond.brandName} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE) > 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Item i
i.deleted_date IS NULL
AND MATCH(i.item_name) AGAINST(#{cond.itemName} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE) > 0
